title: Cant sign into Amazon apps (Shopping, Music or Audible) on 4a5G
content:
I have a Pixel 4a 5G (coming from Pixel 2XL) and I cannot sign into any Amazon apps. Shopping, Music or Audible. It loads the app and then says three buttons "Already a customer? Sign In" "New to Amazon.com" "Skip sign on" if I click Already a customer, it loads the sign in button for literally 1 second then goes back to the previous page and says a toast notification "Please check you internet connection and try again.(1)"

I have cleared data/cache. I have uninstalled, restarted and reinstalled. I have allowed every permission available in App settings but it will not allow me in. If I skip sign on its goes to a dog with "uh oh something went wrong" page. I can force a refresh and I can see the items for sale for again literally 1 second then it goes back to the uh oh page. It does this on all the apps. I can sign in fine on Chrome as a website.

I went into Amazon settings and deauthorized all the devices just to see if there was some hidden limit but it didn't help.

Any ideas?
